alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 8:50PM CDT until April 16 at 3:09PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Concordia, Adams and Wilkinson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 48.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 48.0 Sat 8 pm CDT 47.6 47.2 46.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 8 AM CDT.
